name: Centropogon roraimanus
reference: Repert. Spec. Nov. Regni Veg. 26: 6, pl. 72, fig. 24. 1929

name: Siphocampylus flavescens
distribution: Minas Gerais (Brazil Southeast, Brazil, Southern America)
locality: Olaria, Serra Negra, on vicinal road 10 km from BR-267, 1032 m
remarks: doi:10.1600/036364422X16512564801597 Etymology: name refers to the colour of the corolla, which is entirely yellow, a trait that distinguishes the new species from most of the Brazilian species of Siphocampylus.
